SELECT distinct "userId"
FROM public."Payment" 
WHERE "userId" IN (
    1035804, 1869753, 2136980, 2463744, 2618892, 2820251, 2862536, 
    2753830, 2820613, 2933172, 2970863, 2972358, 2980537, 3040890, 
    3066444, 3088095, 3090626, 2922159, 2960834, 2979346, 3018311, 
    3074687, 3079951, 3085073, 3085890, 1920249, 2290521, 2751892
) 
AND "status" = 'responseReceivedFailure' 
GROUP BY  "userId" 
ORDER BY "userId";
